sentence.Network_en: Kim's mother agreed to vouch for Maria and get her a job.
sentence.Network_cn: 金的母亲同意为玛丽亚担保，好让她找份工作。

sentence.Network_en: He cannot vouch for the accuracy of the story.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不能证明这一说法的准确性。

sentence.Network_en: They asked whether I was prepared to vouch for him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们问我是否愿意为他作担保.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... vociferous 喧嚣,呼喊的 vouch 担保,保证,支持 vow 立誓,誓言,誓约.
财务英语英汉对照表  -... ... voucher system 凭单付款制度 vouching 编制凭单，审核，审批 vulnerability 脆弱性，易收损失.

list.abs: I vouch for the quality of my products ., 我担保我的产品的质量.
Why doesn ' t a densitometer always vouch for the quality of colors ?, 为何光密度计不总能保证色彩品质?
a candidate whose strong record vouches for her aBility ., 候选人良好的记录证实了她的能力.
Character  - Chinese Character... ... 拍子[ bat] 拍胸脯[ vouch for] 拍案而起[ strike the table and rise to one’s feet].

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (as a legal term in the sense 'summon a person to court to prove title to property'): from Old French voucher 'summon', based on Latin vocare 'to call'

sentences.sentence: "I vouch for the quality of my products"

means.word_mean: 3. summon (a vouchee) into court to warrant or defend a title

sentences.sentence: "He vouched his words by his deeds"

auth_sentence.content: He needs to find someone to vouch for him.
auth_sentence.res_content: He needs to find someone to vouch for him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He needs to find someone to vouch for him.

auth_sentence.content: For the truth of this I vouch the mathematicians.
auth_sentence.res_content: For the truth of this I vouch the mathematicians.

sentences.en: He vouched his words by his deeds.
sentences.cn: 他用自己的行动证明了自己的言辞。

means.word_mean: 替… 担保( 或保证)

sentences.en: They asked whether I was prepared to vouch for him.
sentences.cn: 他们问我是否愿意为他作担保。

sentences.en: You should give the names of two people who can vouch for your honesty and reliability.
sentences.cn: 你应该提供两个能担保你诚实可信的人的名字。

sentences.en: I can vouch for the fact that he is a good worker.
I was in bed with flu. My wife can vouch for that/me.
sentences.cn: 当时我患流感卧床休息。我妻子可为此/为我作证。

sentences.en: I can’t vouch for this hotel (= I have no personal experience of it) but it looked wonderful from the brochure.
sentences.cn: 我没住过这家旅馆，可从指南上看它很棒。
